summary: Diff implements the admin bottom nav changes (removes Settings item; enlarges buttons and adds borders). Logout functionality appears to be wired via useSession in AdminLayoutShell and UserDashboard, but the diff is truncated so UI/behavior cannot be fully verified. The incorrect time-area labels fix is not evidenced (ClockCard not modified), and an "MT-LOAN" label still appears in the admin header in the shown snippet.

missing_requirements.requirement: Keep the Admin Settings (SystemSettingsSection) reachable via an existing entry point (e.g., AdminGridMenu tile continues to navigate to 'settings').
missing_requirements.reason: AdminBottomNav removes the settings nav item, but the diff does not show any confirmation that an alternative entry point (e.g., admin dashboard grid/tile) still links to 'settings'.

missing_requirements.requirement: User dashboard header (frontend/src/features/user/UserDashboard.tsx) includes a Logout control that logs the user out (clears session) and returns the app to the logged-out state.
missing_requirements.reason: UserDashboard adds handleLogout() calling logout(), but the file is truncated before showing whether a visible Logout control is actually rendered in the header.

missing_requirements.requirement: In the Admin panel header, restore the previous Logout button behavior and remove the newly added header button that replaced it.
missing_requirements.reason: AdminLayoutShell includes logout wiring, but the diff is truncated before confirming the final header controls. Additionally, the shown snippet still renders a dashboard-only "MT-LOAN" header button, so it is unclear whether the requested replacement button was removed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Fix the incorrect text near the time display so the time area only shows the clock time/date and does not show unrelated labels (e.g., MT Loan/HMT).
missing_requirements.reason: No changes are shown to the clock/time UI component (ClockCard). The diff summary does not include modifications to frontend/src/features/user/components/ClockCard.tsx or surrounding time display layout, so the issue is not evidenced as fixed.
evidence: frontend/src/features/user/UserDashboard.tsx (references ClockCard but no ClockCard changes shown)
